structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Resolution or ordinance of public body for aid to authority.
law.text: The exercise by a public body of the power to aid a housing authority may be authorized by resolution or ordinance of the legislative body of the public body adopted by a majority of the members of the legislative body present at a meeting of the legislative body, which resolution or ordinance may be adopted at the meeting at which it is introduced. The resolution or ordinance shall take effect immediately and need not be laid over or published or posted.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2741x-21.
